sentences.en: Digital record keeping is another change coming to dentistry.The UCSF clinic went digital about a year ago, and dentists there believe paper files will be obsolete within 10 or 15 years.
sentences.cn: 牙科学的另一项改变则是记录保存的数字化，UCSF诊所一年前实施了数字化，这里的牙医们相信在未来10到15年内，纸质档案将被淘汰。

sentences.en: He's only practised dentistry for a year.

sentences.en: Her special field is implant - retained facial prostheses and implant dentistry.
sentences.cn: 目前主要从事种植外科临床工作,兼顾种植修复.

sentences.en: His work was important in helping establish dentistry as a separate profession.
sentences.cn: 他在推动牙医学发展成一门独立学科的过程中发挥了重要作用.

sentences.en: In those days, dentistry was basic. Extractions were carried out without anaesthetic.
sentences.cn: 那时候，牙科学刚起步，拔牙都不打麻药。

sentences.en: Like many areas of dentistry, aesthetic indirect restorative materials have improved significantly in the last decade.
sentences.cn: 象牙科其他许多范畴一样,再过去十多年间, 美学间接修复资料有了很大的提高.

sentences.en: Local Alveolar ridge deformities in the anterior area a great concern during restorative and esthetic dentistry.
sentences.cn: 在前牙区的局部骨缺损,对于赝复科及美容牙医学而言已演变为重要的议题.

sentences.en: Objective : To explore the relation of gingivoplasty and esthetic dentistry.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨牙龈成形外科与美容牙科的关系.

sentences.en: Prof. of Dentistry: Kiss is infectious and antiseptic.
sentences.cn: 牙科学教授: 接吻有传染性及有杀菌作用.

sentences.en: Since a long period ago, the dentistry diagnosis is mainly depended on the X - ray photograph.
sentences.cn: 长期以来, 牙科领域的诊断等大多以 X 射线胶片照相为主要手段.

sentences.en: The figures comprise students who have applied for medicine, dentistry, veterinary sciences and Oxbridge entry.
sentences.cn: 上述数据包含申请医学 、 牙科学和兽医科学专业以及申请牛津(Oxford)和剑桥(Cambridge)的学生.

sentences.en: The NHS budget has doubled in the past decade while dentistry decayed.
sentences.cn: 近十年NHS预算增加了一倍,牙医缺萎缩了.
